name: Playa Del Carmen Mexico Spearfishing Charter
description: Amazing, amazing, amazing. Spearfishing Today offers you this all inclusive special spearfishing charter for two people. Only in Playa del Carmen Mexico. Only with Spearfishing Today. The idea is simple. Book this all inclusive spearfishing trip and you will not only get an unforgettable time spearfishing; we will also outfit you in two Spearfishing Today Dry-fit Polo Shirts. Is there more? Yes there is. We will make you fresh ceviche from your catch during your spearfishing trip as well.
